name: Relate Data
description: Unified platform for monitoring and cybersecurity built on a big data platform. Get actionable insights with advanced analytics and automated workflow management by AI driven workflows.

jobs.title: Software engineer
jobs.description:
Are you an experienced developer looking for a change of career and join a progressively scaling award winning scale up who puts innovation and technology on the forefront?

Do you want to advance career to the next level working on Cybersecurity, 5G, IoT, Machine Learning and Big Data platforms ?

Innovation being our “core-value” we constantly enhance our Monitoring & Cybersecurity platform with latest technologies and trends in the cloud computing, information security and analytics sectors.


Having thrived our start-up years, we are now scaling-up with offices in London, Warsaw and Belfast and have received the top startup in the EU & solution of the year award and several recognitions from European Union and Horizon 2020 programs.


To support our ongoing growth, we’re looking for a Software Developer with professional competence in either C++, Java or React JavaScript with interest in the cybersecurity, big data analytics and telecommunications industry to join us and get involved with a wide range of upcoming projects.



WHAT YOU WILL DO?


Develop Agile components for our existing platform.
Deploy, configure and enhance features for our solution and platform.
Refactor and document new or existing modules.
Develop microservices.
Learn new technologies and languages (we use C, C++, Java, Python, React and Node JS, Redux, Typescript, Scala and Golang, so the sky’s the limit)

MUST HAVE :

3-4 years of commercial experience in a similar industry.
Information Technology university qualification (Bachelors/Masters)
Proficient in one of the following: JAVA, C++, React JS or Python.
Hands-on Linux experience (Centos/Debian/Ubuntu)


DESIREABLE :


Amazon Web Services.
Hadoop ecosystem.
Machine learning frameworks and models.
Telecoms or networking, including basic routing, switching and configuration.
User experience and design(Frontend specific).

COMPETITIVE SALARY & BONUS PACKAGE

(depending on experience)


SOUNDS LIKE YOU?


*APPLY NOW*
